name: cache_and_sync_love
author: Eric Carty-Fickes <ericcf@northwestern.edu>
description: A library for use with caching and synchronizing client side data with a server.

scripts.test:ci: node_modules/.bin/eslint src test && node_modules/karma/bin/karma start karma-ci.conf.js
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && node_modules/.bin/uglifyjs src/*.js vendor/md5.min.js -m -c --source-map dist/cache_and_sync_love.js.map -o dist/cache_and_sync_love.min.js && node_modules/.bin/uglifyjs src/*.js vendor/md5.min.js -b -o dist/cache_and_sync_love.js
